籤詩版本二:
Ke aʻo aku nei au iā ʻoe, mai noi aku iā ia, ua lele ʻo ia e like me ka crane a pana mai i nā pua huna iā ʻoe.
Inā hele ʻoe e ʻohi wahie a he nahesa i loko o ka mauʻu, nahu ʻia ʻoe i ka ʻawaʻawa a kaumaha ʻoe.
詩意:
He hōʻailona kēia hexagram no ka noho palekana a mālama iā ʻoe iho.
E akahele i na mea a pau.
解曰: E pani i kou waha a paʻa i kou mau niho. He malama ole. Inā hewa ʻoe. ʻO ka hopena, hoʻopōʻino iā ia iho.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Hālāwai papa papa
E hele ana ka Emepera Taizong o ka moʻokūʻauhau Tang i ke komohana a ua paʻa ʻo ia ma ke kūlanakauhale ʻo Suoyang.
Ua kauoha ʻia ʻo Xue Dingshan e lawelawe ma ke ʻano he mākaʻi alanui ʻelua a hele aku e hoʻopakele i ka Haku a hoʻomaha iā Xiliao.
Ma hope o ka puka ʻana o kekahi poʻe mai Yumen Pass, hiki lākou i ka mauna ʻo Qipan. Ua hoʻopilikia ʻia ʻo Dou Yihu, ke aliʻi o ka mauna, i ka hoʻopuni ʻia e ka pūʻali koa ʻo Tang, ʻo Luo Tong, ʻo ka mea pōmaikaʻi, ʻo kona kaikuahine ʻo Dou Xiantong he haumāna ia na ka makuahine hemolele o nā pua melemele a ua mākaukau ʻo ia i ka ʻoihana kaua. paʻa i ke kaula fairy a nakinaki iā Luo Tong, alakaʻi ponoʻī ʻo Xue Dingshan i nā koa elite.
(Kulike ka poem i kakau ia me keia)
Ua ʻike ʻo Dou Xiantong i ka uʻi o Xue Dingshan a makemake ʻo ia e hoaaloha me Feng Luan, akā ua hōʻole ʻo Xue Dingshan. Ma hope mai, alakaʻi pū ʻo Dou Yihu i nā kaikunāne Qipanshan e hoʻi i ka mōʻī Tang e kōkua i ka mōʻī Tang e lanakila ai ma Western Liao.
聖意: ʻO ka palekana o ka home, ka makemake ponoʻī, ka ʻimi ʻana i ka waiwai, ke kali ʻana i ka manawa, ka stagnation ʻoihana, ʻaʻole i ʻae ʻia ka male, Liujia hoʻopunipuni wahaheʻe, nā pedestrians blocking fields, silkworms, ʻeono holoholona, ​​nā poʻe nalowale, blocking public lawsuits, loss (Mo Xing) Migration, conservative, nalo ka waiwai, paakiki ka mai, ka lua mauna, laki maikai
第X籤: He kanakolukumamāhiku i lanakila i ka hailona
